DataElement.preferredName: Adjuvant Hormonal Therapy Prior Administered Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient had previous hormonal therapy as preventive  treatment for an earlier stage of this cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the prior adjuvant hormonal therapy being administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Agents given to augment or stimulate a primary therapy or alleviate adverse effects caused by the primary therapy.(NCI):Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level. The treatment may include administration of hormones or hormone analogs to the patient, or decreasing the level of hormones in the body by using hormone antagonists, or hormone ablation therapy. The concept covers but not limited to: intermittent or permanent hormone suppression or ablation in treatment of hormone-dependent tumors, hormone replacement therapy of any kind, hormonal component of gender reassignment therapy, hormonal contraception, surgical and radiation castration.

Concepts.definition: An agent that enhances the activity or therapeutic effect of another pharmacologic substance without having much, if any, therapeutic impact by itself.
Various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COMMENT_112
ReferenceDocuments.description: Add instruction to template form: do not include steroids given with chemotherapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received adjuvant radiotherapy within 2 weeks of planned start of study treatment

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all hormonal therapy been completed for at least 4 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had any hormonal therapy directed at the malignant tumor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has hormonal therapy been completed at least 3 weeks prior to Step 2 registration?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all hormonal therapy been discontinued at least 3 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has hormonal therapy been discontinued at least 3 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received endocrine therapy?
